General.Name: Minnova Corp
General.Description: Minnova Corp. acquires, explores for, and develops mineral properties. It holds 100% interests in the PL Gold mine and the Nokomis property located in Manitoba. The company was formerly known as Auriga Gold Corp. and changed its name to Minnova Corp. in June 2014. Minnova Corp. was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 217 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 0R2

1.Name: Mr. Christopher E.O. Irwin B.A., L.L.B., L.L.M., LL.M., LLB, Q.C.
1.Title: Interim CFO, Corp. Sec. & Director
